MR#____________

WAYNE COUNTY HOSPITAL
REQUEST TO REVIEW/RECEIVE MEDICAL INFORMATION
PATIENT IDENTIFICATION
Patient Name _____________________________________________________________ DOB______________________________
Address __________________________________________________________________ Phone No._________________________
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________
I, ______________________________________________________________________________________, do hereby request to
_____review ____receive a copy of medical record information by __________________fax, ______________________email,
_____mail, or _____ pick-up
The record being requested is of ____self

____child

____other___________________________________________.
(Specify)

Date(s) of Service ___________________________________________

Specific Information Requested
____ Discharge Summary

____ History & Physical

____Operative Report

____ Lab

____ Radiology

____ Drs. Orders

____ Pathology Report

____ Entire Medical Record

____ ER Record

____ Other (specify) ___________________________________________________________

Reason for Request
____ Continuity of Care

____ Personal Interest

____ Insurance Claims Processing

____ Legal Claims Processing

____ Other (specify) ________________________________

Identification Presented
____ Driver’s License

____Work ID

____ School ID

____ Other (specify)__________________

**Based on KRS 422.317 a first copy of a patient’s record will be provided free, subsequent copies may be charged.

______________________________
Date

_______________________________________________________________________
(Patient, Parent, or Legal Representative) Please circle

Date
